issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

fields.summary: Fail to compile in Branch HDFS-2832 with COMPILATION ERROR

comments.body: Hi Wenwu, this should be some warnings instead of an errors and not involved by any changes on HDFS-2832. Please check your build env.

Thanks for responding to this Eric.

Wenwu, please resync to the latest revision.

Thanks for helpful respondce Eric and Arpit.
 it is passed after sync to the latest version.
